page_content:
21As we continue to work toward a more inclusive organization, we believe in 
educating our people about the importance of diversity. Our annual Code of Conduct training covers our anti-discrimination and anti-harassment policies, and every employee is required to participate. Through our talent management platform, employees can access a variety of online courses that cover topics such as Working Well with Everyone, The Power of Inclusion, Workplace Diversity and Diversity for Leaders.Diversity Training
